body.name: Dr. Brown's Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ Wide-Neck Baby Bottle Newborn Feeding Set with Baby Bottle Travel Caps
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 36 mins
FREE pickup Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 36 mins
features: ANTI-COLIC BABY BOTTLE. Anti-Colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Decreases spit-up, burping and gas.
CONSISTENT FLOW RATE. Vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so babies can feed at their own pace.
PRESERVES NUTRIENTS. The anti-colic vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep.
BREASTFEEDING BOTTLE. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again.

BOTTLE GROWS WITH BABY. Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ baby bottle works best with the internal vent system in place but can be removed as baby’s feeding develops – no need to introduce a different bottle.
SUSTAINABLE BABY BOTTLE. Dr. Brown’s Wide-Neck bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable.

PLASTIC BANK COLLABORATION. Dr. Brown’s has collaborated with Plastic Bank to prevent ocean plastic and reduce their plastic footprint. Purchasing Dr. Brown’s baby bottles help toward their commitment to prevent 31 million plastic bottles from entering the ocean annually. Learn more at PlasticBank.com.
DISHWASHER SAFE. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free.

Gift Set (0m+) Includes: 3 – 9oz/270mL bottles, 2 – 5oz/150mL bottles, 5 – Level 1 (Slow Flow) Nipples, 2 – Level 2 (Medium Flow) Nipples, 2 – storage/travel caps. Store, transport and warm bottles with ease using the included storage/travel caps.
body.description: Your options have never been better with Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow® Anti-Colic Options+™ Wide-Neck Baby Bottle Newborn Gift Set. The anti-colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Dr. Brown’s bottles provide a more comfortable feeding experience for baby by decreasing spit-up, burping and gas. This vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so baby can feed at their own pace. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again. Dr. Brown’s vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep. The silicone nipple, together with the internal vent system, offer a reliable and trusted bottle feeding experience that makes Dr. Brown’s the #1 Pediatrician Recommended Baby Bottle in the U.S.* Made to grow with baby, our bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free. *IQVIA Health ProVoice Survey 2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped my baby so much!
reviews.reviewText: We tried mams bottles with size 0 nipples and they were still too fast of a flow for my baby. She was getting so much air when she drank which caused colic issues. We switched to these bottles and they help so much! The flow is perfect for my baby and she isn’t getting as much air. The bottles do leak if you don’t use the leak proof caps on them when traveling. Easy to clean. Great quality bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dr. Browns is my go to!
reviews.reviewText: I love the Dr. Browns bottles, BUT there are some things I would like to change. I've noticed with the wide mouth bottles, they tend to leak of the round air flow system isn't perfectly flush with the actual bottle- even when it's underfilled (not filled to the max line). cleaning could be easier- I had found some left over milk residue on the (again) round air flow system hiding in the crevices. but overall, I would not change my bottles preference. I do appreciate the different sizes that these bottles come in (skinny 4oz & 8oz, wide 5oz & 9oz). My son has larger lips and I find that he has a better time latching to the wide mouth nipples versus the skinny nips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our baby does well on these. The wide nipple is similar to the breast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product is Durable and value for money
reviews.reviewText: Grand son is now 8 months and he is still using this bottle. A few nipping have been changed due to the sterilization was make it expand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bottles helped my baby tremendously! No more constant gas which led to crying. Than you Dr Brown!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but can leak.
reviews.reviewText: These are great as long as you have every piece in right and don’t heat them up with the vent in place, otherwise they will leak. I think they do help with gas.

reviews.reviewText: Son perfectas por que traen otro grupo de chupo es para cuando mi bebe crezca y tenga que tener transición de los chupo es de newborn a flow 1, son de fácil agarre para mi bebe y ayuda mucho para los cólicos

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto - Justo lo que buscaba
reviews.reviewText: Me llegó en buenas condiciones, Justo lo que buscaba.
No hay mucho qué decir. Todo bien, buen servicio, entrega rápida, producto de excelente calidad

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto a un precio accesible
reviews.reviewText: Sigo utilizando los biberones y mi bebé ya tiene 3 meses, buena calidad, se esterilizan sin dañarse, se puede utilizar transportando la leche con sus tapas, sin derrames y trae cambio de tetinas para los 3 meses del bebé, quedé satisfecha con la compra
